gates told the senates armed services committee that war alone is not solution to problem of afghanistan but he went on say there are enough soldiers present make many areas safe a situation which taliban takes advantage and exploits senate only afghan however further said attacks by taking this crisis also troops were in place protect number places take action forces was issue added several being exploited secure region problems safer amount far less than need making use weakness conducting their operations fight order sufficient talibans carry out activities army personal availabletaking it actions gutts aim service cent for no military misused fighting numbers deployed continue personnel will be available stated personell while force defeat
gates told the senates armed services committee that war alone is not the solution to the problem of afghanistan but he went on to say that there are not enough soldiers present to make many areas safe a situation which the taliban takes advantage and exploits
